findings.title: Possible Outdated Balance For Share Calculation
findings.description: The SmoothyV1 contract calculates pool share for mint/redeem and distributes protocol revenue to pool share holders, but it may use outdated balance due to reliance on precise measurement of current pool assets which can be distributed in various yToken contracts.

findings.title: Revisited Trust on Admin Keys
findings.description: In SmoothyV1, there is a privileged contract, i.e., `owner`, that plays a critical role in configuring and regulating the system-wide operations (e.g., `soft/hard weight` adjustment and `yToken` assignment).
